about:
Hello my name is Cao Thanh Duc.
 I am a  Website Developer based in Da Nang City, with a strong passion for crafting innovative and user-centric digital solutions.
 My academic background in Information Technology, specialized in Software Engineering, has provided me with a robust foundation in programming and system design. 
I am committed to continuous learning, actively staying updated with the latest web development technologies and methodologies.
 Beyond coding, I explore new tools and frameworks to enhance my skill set, aiming to develop high-impact web platforms that deliver seamless and engaging user experiences.
